title: Dependency specs of mpich changed after the variant +slurm was added to packages.yaml

labels.name: triage
labels.description: The issue needs to be prioritized

body:
The compiler version of some dependencies of mpich changed after I added `+slurm` as a constraint in `packages.xml`.

### Steps to reproduce the issue

```console
## Use pre-installed slurm, set the compiler spec to gcc@4.8.5 which is also pre-installed.
$ spack config --scope site edit packages
  slurm:
    buildable: false
    externals:
    - prefix: /usr
      spec: slurm@18-08-5-2%gcc@4.8.5+hwloc+mariadb+pmix sysconfdir=/etc/slurm

## Install slurm, gcc@10.2.0 and mpich@3.3.2.
$ spack install slurm
$ spack install gcc@10.2.0 %gcc@4.8.5
$ spack install mpich+slurm %gcc@10.2.0

## Add +slurm to packages.yaml to avoid tedious typing.
$ spack config --scope site edit packages
  mpich:
    variants: ['+slurm']
```
